abstractText: Larval fish collection is critical for the continued conservation of the threatened or endangered fish species. The deployment and utiliztion of plankton drift nets to effectively capture live larvae in the process of dispersment is paramount in obtaining individuals for aconservation aquaculture program.Thiscollection process beginswhen larval monitoring methods detects a spike in numbers of early free embryo stages, indicating an upcoming pulse of dritfing larvae(Howell and McLellan 2013a; 2013b; 2014a; 2014b).
title: Larval White Sturgeon Collection v1.0
